attributes.action: TREAT THE GURKHAS EQUALLY WITH OTHER UK SERVICEMENT & WOMEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir,

We the undersigned ex servicemen & women are ashamed that our government treats our brothers in arms in the Gurkha Regiments as second class citizens.

The Gurkhas serve our country selflessly and fearlessly and have done so for over a century.

The fight in the same wars and are killed and wounded in the same way as any other British Soldier.

They should not, therefore, be subjected to reduced pensions and disability allowances but should be treated fairly and equally with all other British Servicemen & Women.

I urge you Sir, to take immediate action to rectify this deplorable situation.
